revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A method of ascertaining the latitude in the northern hemisphere : by a single altitude of the polar star, at any time ; with tables computed for that purpose. By Jo..."
revision.text: Possibly: A method of ascertaining the latitude in the northern hemisphere : by a single altitude of the polar star, at any time ; with tables computed for that purpose. By John Stevens, In the Service of the East India Company. (Cambridge : Printed by F. Hodson, at the Corner of Green-Street. And sold by W. Heather, Leadenhall-Street, London, 1800). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/745182927
